description.value:
Allows joints to rotate 360 Degrees, gives +20 to Contortionist Tests, +5 to Dodge Tests, and reduces time for Squeeze Through Special Action of Contortionist Skill by Half. When gaining however, permenantly reduces Strength and Toughness by 1d5.

Requirements

Some more ignorant individuals may mistake it as a mutation due to little obvious mechanical influence.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
